articles.title: Bitcoin To Online Petwear: "Papa Musk" Lures Investors - NDTV
articles.description: A "#bitcoin" tag on Elon Musk's Twitter profile page led to a 14% jump in the cryptocurrency on Friday, the latest in a series of market moves triggered by comments on his social media account.
articles.content:
